text: This is a list of Italian regions by highest point. ==List== Rank Region Highest point Province Elevation 1\. Valle d'Aosta Monte BiancoSince the French Revolution, the issue of the ownership of the summit has been discussed. none 2\. Piemonte Grenzgipfel (Monte Rosa) Verbano-Cusio-Ossola 3\. Lombardia La Spedla Sondrio 4\. Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol Ortles Bolzano 5\. Veneto Marmolada Belluno 6\. Sicilia Mount Etna Catania 7\. Abruzzo Corno Grande (Gran Sasso) L'Aquila, Teramo 8\.
